code: import React from"react";import ApexCharts from"react-apexcharts";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var series=[{name:'Your Activity',type:'column',data:[350,275,375,375,300,225,275]},{name:'Your Goal',type:'line',data:[400,350,450,400,350,300,350]}];var chartSettings={colors:["#FFCA41","#43BC13"],chart:{height:350,type:'line',toolbar:{show:false}},stroke:{curve:"straight",width:[0,1]},dataLabels:{enabled:true,enabledOnSeries:[1],style:{fontSize:'10px',fontWeight:500},background:{borderWidth:0}},labels:["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"],legend:{position:"top",floating:true},xaxis:{type:'category',axisBorder:{show:false},axisTicks:{show:false},labels:{show:true,style:{colors:"#6B859E"}}},yaxis:{show:false},fill:{type:"solid",opacity:1},plotOptions:{bar:{borderRadius:10}},grid:{show:false}};export default function ApexActivityChart(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApexCharts,{options:chartSettings,series:series,type:"area",height:275});}
